channel.title: Conference on Leipzig Gophers
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on Leipzig Gophers

item.title: KI-Tage Halle 2025
item.description:
KI-Tage Halle 2025

KI-Tage Halle is a two-day event with a broad program around AI in Halle (Saale).

We wrote a small radio stream capturing script in Go that recorded about 2000 hours of radio in 11/2025 from four different broadcasting stations: MDR Aktuell, DLF, DLF Kultur, DLF Nova.

We then used canary-v2-1b to transcribe the mostly german audio, grepped the term “KI” in the sentences and stichted together a mostly static website, where you can glance into radio voices talking about AI:

item.title: GoLab 2025
item.description:
GoLab 2025

Since 2015, Develer has been organizing one of the best Go conferences on the continent: GoLab - bringing together the international and Italian Go developer community in the beautiful city of Florence. Happy 10th birthday, GoLab!

This year, GoLab will take place Oct 5-7, 2025!

Thoughtfulness in environmental stewardship and social responsibility continues with GoLab 2025 through their GoLab for the Planet initiative.

The conference offers a variety of topics and formats:

  • In-depth Workshops: Hands-on learning experiences for practical skill development.
  • Technical Talks: Presentations on the latest advancements, best practices, and challenges in Go development.
  • Lightning Talks: Quick, insightful interventions that spark new ideas and discussions.

Check out the GoLab 2025 schedule for more details.

item.title: GOLAB 2024
item.description:
GOLAB 2024

GOLAB, The International Conference on Go is a wonderful event that brings together developers from Europe and beyond in Florence, Italy since 2015 and which will take place 2024-11-11 to 2024-11-13 this year, featuring a discovery and deep dive track as well as workshops on introductory and advanced topics. Find out more:

  • Conference homepage: golab.io
  • GOLAB on Twitter
  • GOLAB YouTube Channel, recordings from previous years

We partnered with GOLAB and are excited to share discount codes for tickets üéüÔ∏è ‚Äî just drop by our next event!

item.title: Go at devopenspace 2023
item.description: devopenspace is a regular, classic unconference on software engineering and related topics - this year, there are a few Go and cloud related workshops as well! See the agenda for more details.

item.title: CLT23
item.description:
CLT23

We briefly presented at the annual Chemnitz Linux Days (CLT) conference on 2023-03-11. The topic was Sustainability and Security in the Go ecosystem, collecting a few thoughts starting from the ACM Queue article Surviving Software Dependencies (2019).

Keywords: security, data breach, dependency management, distributed package management, OSV, vulnerability scanning.

We prepared a demo for the vanity URL import supported by Go package system - check out clt23 or try:

$ go install golangleipzig.space/clt23@latest
$ clt23

CLT is a nice event to learn and connect with people from the open source community.

item.title: Decentralized Storage Summit Berlin
item.description:
In Meetup #4 we learned about a Go project using the Lightning Network. Many more projects in the Cryptocurrenty space use Go, such filecoin, subprojects from sia and many more.

If you are excited about these technologies, why not attend the Decentralized Storage Summit at TU Berlin on Friday, August 23, 2019?

Here’s a link to a discount code to get in for free:

  • https://www.eventbrite.com/e/decentralised-storage-summit-tickets-62719912948?discount=DC2

Enjoy.
